A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Easily the biggest and best Star Wars since Empire. I didn’t initially like it\, feeling like it dashed my preconceived notions of what Star Wars “should” be about. But in reality it has always been about the failure of Hero Myths to deliver true and lasting peace. Every Jedi and Sith has failed to live up to the ideals they pledge from an excess of arrogance and self-interest. Star Wars is a revolution story and this movie finally makes that clear.
